meanings.definition: A person or thing that traverses or crosses over a place or obstacle.
meanings.sent1: The brave traverser crossed the river on a shaky bridge.
meanings.sent2: The hiker was a skilled traverser of the mountain trails.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel became a traverser of the backyard fence.
meanings.sent4: The migratory birds were expert traversers of the vast sky.
meanings.sent5: The determined ant was a tiny but mighty traverser of the kitchen floor.

meanings.definition: To pass or move over, along, or through.
meanings.sent1: The cat tried to traverser the narrow ledge without falling.
meanings.sent2: The car will traverser the bridge to reach the other side of the city.
meanings.sent3: The balloon traversered through the clouds, enjoying the view from above.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts traversered various memories before settling on a decision.
meanings.sent5: The river traversered the forest, carving its path through the trees.
